# Country Analysis

This page analyzes life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population over time for a selected country.

```{python}
#ï½œ echo: true
#| eval: true

# Filter data for a specific country (e.g., Japan)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

gapminder = pd.read_csv("/Users/maxjiang/qtm350-quiz02/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv")

country_data = gapminder[gapminder['country'] == 'Japan']

# Plot the changes over time
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(country_data['year'], country_data['life_expectancy'], label='Life Expectancy')
plt.plot(country_data['year'], country_data['gdp_per_capita'], label='GDP per Capita')
plt.plot(country_data['year'], country_data['population_millions'], label='Population (millions)')
plt.title('Changes in Life Expectancy, GDP per Capita, and Population for Japan')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.legend()
plt.show()
```
